ai-patthana17.16:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.16:1.1_0: For one who has not arisen, nor is a condition for the object,
ai-patthana17.16:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana17.16:2.1_0: Three bases for eighteen objects, three and eighteen bases produced by unarisen in the company of the noble ones,
